mapper.sql: t.id, t.eqp_id, t.state, t.state_previous, t.state_10, t.start_time, t.end_time, t.state_times, t.create_date, t.update_date
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.eqp_id, t.state, t.state_previous, t.state_10, start_time, t.end_time, t.state_times, t.create_date, t.update_date FROM edc_eqp_state t WHERE start_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and eqp_id=#{eqpId} order by start_time
select * from edc_eqp_state where start_time < #{startTime} and eqp_id=#{eqpId} and state != 'ALARM' order by start_time desc limit 1
select * from edc_eqp_state where start_time > #{startTime} and eqp_id=#{eqpId} order by start_time limit 1
